price: 30. »¡Pueblo mío!, ¿quién me protegerá (del castigo) de Al-lah si echo a esos creyentes de mi lado (como pedís)? ¿Acaso no reflexionáis?
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَن يَنصُرُنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِن طَرَدتُّهُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi man yanṣurunī mina al-lahi in ṭaradttuhum afalā tadhakkarūna
